subject: Company Website Down
description: Company website is completely inaccessible. Customers cannot access online services, make purchases, or view product information. This is affecting business operations significantly.
resolution: Restored website from backup and fixed server issues
resolution_steps: Diagnosed web server issues and identified root cause
Restored website files from latest backup
Updated web server configuration and security settings
Implemented monitoring to prevent future outages
root_cause: Server configuration issues and database connectivity
